stats.name: blocks
stats.description: Short for blocked shot, number of times when a defensive player legally deflects a field goal attempt from an offensive player.

stats.name: defensiveRebounds
stats.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

stats.name: steals
stats.description: The number of times a defensive player forced a turnover by intercepting or deflecting a pass or a dribble of an offensive player.

stats.name: turnoverPoints
stats.description: The amount of points resulting from the possession following a turnover.

stats.name: defReboundRate
stats.description: The percentage of missed shots that a team rebounds defensively. Rebound Rate = (Defensive Rebounds x Team Minutes) divided by [Player Minutes x (Team Defensive Rebounds + Opponent Defensive Rebounds)].

stats.name: avgDefensiveRebounds
stats.description: The average defensive rebounds per game.

stats.name: avgBlocks
stats.description: The average blocks per game.

stats.name: avgSteals
stats.description: The average steals per game.

stats.name: avg48DefensiveRebounds
stats.description: The average number of defensive rebounds per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Blocks
stats.description: The average number of blocks per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Steals
stats.description: The average number of steals per 48 minutes.

stats.name: disqualifications
stats.description: The number of times a player reached the foul limit.

stats.name: flagrantFouls
stats.description: The number of fouls that the officials thought were unnecessary or excessive.

stats.name: fouls
stats.description: The number of times a player had illegal contact with the opponent.

stats.name: reboundRate
stats.description: The percentage of missed shots that a team rebounds. Rebound Rate = (Rebounds x Team Minutes) divided by [Player Minutes x (Team Rebounds + Opponent Rebounds)]

stats.name: ejections
stats.description: The number of times a player or coach is removed from the game as a result of a serious offense.

stats.name: technicalFouls
stats.description: The number of times an player or coach was called for a technical foul (unsportsmanlike conduct or violations).

stats.name: rebounds
stats.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

stats.name: minutes
stats.description: The total number of minutes played.

stats.name: avgMinutes
stats.description: The average number of minutes per game.

stats.name: fantasyRating
stats.description: The Fantasy Rating of a player.

stats.name: NBARating
stats.description: Custom formula to rate the performance of a player based on points, assists, steals, blocks, turnovers, rebounds, three pointers, and free throws

stats.name: plusMinus
stats.description: A player's estimated on-court impact on team performance measured in point differential per 100 possessions.

stats.name: avgRebounds
stats.description: The average rebounds per game.

stats.name: avgFouls
stats.description: The average fouls committed per game.

stats.name: avgFlagrantFouls
stats.description: The average number of flagrant fouls per game.

stats.name: avgTechnicalFouls
stats.description: The average number of technical fouls per game.

stats.name: avgEjections
stats.description: The average ejections per game.

stats.name: avgDisqualifications
stats.description: The average number of disqualifications per game.

stats.name: assistTurnoverRatio
stats.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

stats.name: stealFoulRatio
stats.description: The average number of steals a player or team records per foul committed.

stats.name: blockFoulRatio
stats.description: The average number of blocks a player or record per foul committed.

stats.name: avgTeamRebounds
stats.description: The average number of rebounds for a team per game.

stats.name: totalRebounds
stats.description: The total number of rebounds for a team or player

stats.name: totalTechnicalFouls
stats.description: The total number of technical fouls for a team or player

stats.name: teamAssistTurnoverRatio
stats.description: The number of assists per turnover for a team

stats.name: teamRebounds
stats.description: The total number of rebounds for a team

stats.name: stealTurnoverRatio
stats.description: The number of steals per turnover

stats.name: avg48Rebounds
stats.description: The average number of rebounds per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Fouls
stats.description: The average number of fouls committed per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48FlagrantFouls
stats.description: The average number of flagrant fouls committed per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48TechnicalFouls
stats.description: The average number of technical fouls committed per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Ejections
stats.description: The average number of ejections per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Disqualifications
stats.description: The average number of disqualifications per 48 minutes.

stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: gamesStarted
stats.description: The number of games started by an athlete.

stats.name: doubleDouble
stats.description: The number of times double digit values were accumulated in 2 of the following categories: points, rebounds, assists, steals, and blocked shots

stats.name: tripleDouble
stats.description: The number of times double digit values were accumulated in 3 of the following categories: points, rebounds, assists, steals, and blocked shots

stats.name: assists
stats.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

stats.name: effectiveFGPct
stats.description: Metric that gives 3pt field goals more worth than 2pt field goals: (FGM + (0.5 x 3PTM)) / FGA

stats.name: fieldGoals
stats.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

stats.name: fieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The number of times a 2pt field goal was attempted.

stats.name: fieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The number of times a 2pt field goal was made.

stats.name: fieldGoalPct
stats.description: The ratio of field goals made to field goals attempted: FGM / FGA

stats.name: freeThrows
stats.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

stats.name: freeThrowPct
stats.description: The ratio of free throws made to free throws attempted: FTM / FTA

stats.name: freeThrowsAttempted
stats.description: The number of times a free throw was attempted.

stats.name: freeThrowsMade
stats.description: The number of times a free throw was made.

stats.name: offensiveRebounds
stats.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

stats.name: points
stats.description: The number of points scored.

stats.name: turnovers
stats.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

stats.name: threePointPct
stats.description: The ratio of 3pt field goals made to 3pt field goals attempted: 3PM / 3PA.

stats.name: threePointFieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The number of times a 3pt field goal was attempted.

stats.name: threePointFieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The number of times a 3pt field goal was made.

stats.name: trueShootingPct
stats.description: What a team's shooting percentage would be if we accounted for free throws and 3-pointers. True Shooting Percentage = (Total points x 50) divided by [(FGA + (FTA x 0.44)].

stats.name: teamTurnovers
stats.description: The number of turnovers for the team.

stats.name: totalTurnovers
stats.description: The number of turnovers plus team turnovers for the team.

stats.name: assistRatio
stats.description: The percentage of a team's possessions that ends in an assist. Assist Ratio = (Assists x 100) divided by [(FGA + (FTA x 0.44) + Assists + Turnovers].

stats.name: pointsInPaint
stats.description: The amount of points scored in the area known as "the Paint"(the rectangle between the foul line and the baseline).

stats.name: offReboundRate
stats.description: The percentage of missed shots that a team rebounds offensively. Offensive Rebound Rate = (Offensive Rebounds x Team Minutes) divided by [Player Minutes x (Team Offensive Rebounds + Opponent Defensive Rebounds)].

stats.name: turnoverRatio
stats.description: The percentage of a team's possessions that end in a turnover. Turnover Ratio = (Turnover x 100) divided by [(FGA + (FTA x 0.44) + Assists + Turnovers].

stats.name: fastBreakPoints
stats.description: The number of points scored on fast breaks.

stats.name: possessions
stats.description: The total number of possessions for a team or player.

stats.name: paceFactor
stats.description: The number of possessions a team uses per game.

stats.name: avgFieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The average field goals made per game.

stats.name: avgFieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The average field goals attempted per game.

stats.name: avgThreePointFieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The average three point field goals made per game.

stats.name: avgThreePointFieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The average three point field goals attempted per game.

stats.name: avgFreeThrowsMade
stats.description: The average free throw shots made per game.

stats.name: avgFreeThrowsAttempted
stats.description: The average free throw shots attempted per game.

stats.name: avgPoints
stats.description: The average number of points scored per game.

stats.name: avgOffensiveRebounds
stats.description: The average offensive rebounds per game.

stats.name: avgAssists
stats.description: The average assists per game.

stats.name: avgTurnovers
stats.description: The average turnovers committed per game.

stats.name: offensiveReboundPct
stats.description: The percentage of the number of times they obtain the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

stats.name: estimatedPossessions
stats.description: An estimation of the number of possessions for a team or player.

stats.name: avgEstimatedPossessions
stats.description: The average number of estimated possessions per game for a team or player.

stats.name: pointsPerEstimatedPossessions
stats.description: The number of points per estimated possession for a team or player

stats.name: avgTeamTurnovers
stats.description: The average number of turnovers for a team per game.

stats.name: avgTotalTurnovers
stats.description: The average number of total turnovers for a team per game.

stats.name: threePointFieldGoalPct
stats.description: The ratio of 3pt field goals made to 3pt field goals attempted: 3PM / 3PA.

stats.name: twoPointFieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The number of 2-point field goals made for a team or player.

stats.name: twoPointFieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The number of 2-point field goals attempted for a team or player.

stats.name: avgTwoPointFieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The number of 2-point field goals made per game for a team or player.

stats.name: avgTwoPointFieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The number of 2-point field goals attempted per game for a team or player.

stats.name: twoPointFieldGoalPct
stats.description: The percentage of 2-points fields goals made by a team or player.

stats.name: shootingEfficiency
stats.description: The efficiency with which a team or player shoots the basketball.

stats.name: scoringEfficiency
stats.description: The efficiency with which a team or player scores the basketball.

stats.name: avg48FieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The average number of fieldgoals made per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48FieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The average number of fieldgoals attempted per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48ThreePointFieldGoalsMade
stats.description: The average per number of 3-Pointers made per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48ThreePointFieldGoalsAttempted
stats.description: The average number of 3-pointers attempted per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48FreeThrowsMade
stats.description: The average number of Free Throws made per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48FreeThrowsAttempted
stats.description: The average number of free throws attempted per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Points
stats.description: The average number of points scored per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48OffensiveRebounds
stats.description: The average number of offenseive rebounds per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Assists
stats.description: The average number of assists per 48 minutes.

stats.name: avg48Turnovers
stats.description: The average number of turnovers per 48 minutes.
